Developer Documentation¶

This module handles all MySQL database interactions for the Task List App.

class app.db_layer.Database(host, user, password, database)¶

Bases: object

Handles connecting, querying, and modifying tasks in the MySQL database.

add_task(task_text)¶

Insert a new task into the database.

close()¶

Close the database connection.

create_table()¶

Create the tasks table if it doesn’t exist.

delete_task(task_id)¶

Delete a task from the database.

fetch_all_tasks()¶

Retrieve all tasks from the database.

update_task(task_text, task_id)¶

Update a task in the database.

This module provides the business logic for interacting with the task database.

class app.logic_layer.TaskManager(db_config)¶

Bases: object

Manages high-level task operations such as loading, adding, updating, and deleting tasks.

add_task(task_text)¶

Add a new task to the database.

close()¶

Close the database connection.

delete_task(task_id)¶

Delete a task from the database.

load_tasks()¶

Load tasks from the database.

update_task(task_text, task_id)¶

Update an existing task in the database.
